design_philosophy.core_concept: Developing film in a concrete bunker. Raw, abrasive, high-contrast, Japanese-influenced minimalism.
key_principles: No Perfect Grids: Embrace overlap and asymmetry.
Grain is Good: Texture over flatness.
Red is Danger: Use the accent color only for critical interactions.
Motion is Liquid: Smooth scrolling and slow reveals.

rules: Headings: Uppercase, tight tracking (-0.05em), massive sizing (text-6xl to text-9xl).
Vertical Text: Use 'writing-mode: vertical-rl' for section markers.
Background is always #0a0a0a, never pure black #000000.
Text is off-white #f0f0f0 to reduce eye strain.
Red is ONLY for: Hover states, Active links, The 'Findelmundo' dot.

strategies: Masonry Layout for Portfolio: Columns shift vertically to break lines.
Overlapping Elements: Text overlays images slightly (negative margin).
Sticky Navigation: Vertical sidebar on desktop, floating bottom bar on mobile.

Button.visuals: Sharp edges (rounded-none), uppercase text, 1px solid border. Hover: Fill with white, text turns black.

Card.visuals: No background, no shadow. Just the image/video and raw text below it.

Navigation.visuals: Mix of vertical and horizontal text. Blur backdrop (backdrop-blur-md).
Navigation.instructions: Desktop: Fixed Left Vertical. Mobile: Fixed Bottom Horizontal.

Cursor.visuals: A small white dot that expands into a ring with 'VIEW' text when hovering media.
Cursor.instructions: Use a custom hook to track mouse position.

specifics.images: Parallax effect (y-axis movement) on scroll. Scale up slightly on hover.

implementation_steps: 1. Setup 'Syne' and 'Space Grotesk' in index.css (import from Google Fonts).
2. Configure tailwind.config.js with the colors and font families.
3. Install 'lenis' and wrap the App in it.
5. Build the 'EnterExperience' intro screen for the Homepage.
6. Build the 'MasonryGrid' for the portfolio page.
7. Implement the Admin Dashboard (simple, table-based, using Shadcn).
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards. Strip them down to raw divs.
Ensure the 'Red' accent is used ONLY for interaction feedback, not decoration.
Images MUST have 'loading="lazy"' except for the Hero.
Videos should autoplay muted loop in the grid.
